rules.name: Comments_are_Mandatory
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7)
rules.label: Comments are Mandatory

rules.name: Follow_Up_Time_is_already_Set
rules.label: Follow Up Time is already Set

rules.name: If_Enquiry_is_in_Lost_Stage
rules.label: If Enquiry is in Lost Stage

rules.name: If_Enquiry_is_in_Interested_Stage
rules.label: If Enquiry is in Interested Stage

rules.name: Site_Visit_Not_Done
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 3)) AND (7 OR 8)
rules.label: Site Visit Not Done

rules.name: Site_Visits
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) AND ((4 AND 6 AND 7) OR 5 )
rules.label: Site Visit

rules.name: Copy_1_of_Is_Follow_Up_Yes
rules.label: Copy 1 of Is Follow Up Yes
